column1: Little Goat Diner////More attitude and 20 minutes later
column2: a more preferable seating arrangement was available and we finally got to experience some of the delicious food here
column3: kind of. The snail like pace from the hostess stand to get seated carried over to the waitstaff. After being seated for about 10 minutes the waiter announced his presence and said he would be back. Another 5 minutes later he came by for the drink orders
column4: and ran off before we could try to throw in our food order as well
column5: because 15 Â minutes with a menu is all the time a normal person requires.
